cc: Charging means to put refrigerant back into the system. Before beginning the system-charging process, always check to be sure the refrigerant level in the machine is sufficient for the job.
Select the service information icon above to reference the refrigerant label.

t2.cc: Select the arrow to adjust the machine to the correct weight of refrigerant.
t2.reportLabel: Adjust the machine to the correct weight of refrigerant.

t4.cc: Rotate the high-side valve to open it.
t4.reportLabel: Open the high side hand valve.

t5.cc: Rotate the high-side valve to close it.
t5.reportLabel: Close the high side hand valve.
